access_token.description: The access token for API operations.

api_timeout.description: Specify timeout in seconds for API operations.

insecure.description: Specify whether to validate TLS certificates.

reauthorize_timeout.description: Specify timeout for how often to reauthorize the access token

refresh_token.description: The refresh token for API operations.

url.description: The base url for API operations.

capacity_in_gb.description: Capacity of the block device in GB.

created_at.description: Date when the entity was created. The date is in ISO 8601 and UTC.

custom_properties.description:
Additional custom properties that may be used to extend the block device. Following disk custom properties can be passed while creating a block device: 

1. dataStore: Defines name of the datastore in which the disk has to be provisioned.
2. storagePolicy: Defines name of the storage policy in which the disk has to be provisioned. If name of the datastore is specified in the custom properties then, datastore takes precedence.
3. provisioningType: Defines the type of provisioning. For eg. thick/thin.

deployment_id.description: The id of the deployment that is associated with this resource.

disk_content_base_64.description: Content of a disk, base64 encoded.

encrypted.description: Indicates whether the block device should be encrypted or not.

expand_snapshots.description: Indicates whether the snapshots of the block-devices should be included in the resource state. Applicable only for first class block devices.

external_id.description: External entity id on the cloud provider side.

external_region_id.description: The external regionId of the resource.

external_zone_id.description: The external zoneId of the resource.

name.description: A human-friendly name for the block device.

org_id.description: The id of the organization this block device belongs to.

owner.description: Email of the user that owns this block device.

persistent.description: Indicates whether the block device survives a delete action.

project_id.description: The id of the project this resource belongs to.

purge.description: Indicates if the disk has to be completely destroyed or should be kept in the system. Valid only for block devices with ‘persistent’ set to true, only used for destroy the resource

source_reference.description: Reference to URI using which the block device has to be created. Example: ami-0d4cfd66

catalog_item_version.description: The version of the catalog item used to request the deployment.

created_at.description: Date when the entity was created. The date is in ISO 6801 and UTC.

created_by.description: The user the entity was created by.

expand_last_request.description: Flag to indicate whether to expand last request on the deployment.

expand_project.description: Flag to indicate whether to expand project information.

expand_resources.description: Flag to indicate whether to expand resources in the deployment.

id.description: The id of the deployment. One of `id` or `name` must be provided.

inputs.description: Inputs provided by the user while requesting / updating the deployment.

last_updated_at.description: Date when the entity was last updated. The date is in ISO 6801 and UTC.

last_updated_by.description: The user that last updated the deployment.

lease_expire_at.description: Date when the deployment lease expire. The date is in ISO 6801 and UTC.

name.description: The name of the deployment. One of `id` or `name` must be provided.

org_id.description: The Id of the organization this deployment belongs to.

owner.description: The user this deployment belongs to.

project_id.description: The id of the project this deployment belongs to.

status.description: The status of the deployment with respect to its life cycle operations.

created_at.description: Date when the entity was created. The date is in ISO 8601 and UTC.

owner.description: Email of the user that owns the entity.

power_state.description: Power state of fabric compute instance.

type.description: Type of the fabric compute instance.

free_size_gb.description: Indicates free size available in datastore.

name.description: A human-friendly name used as an identifier for the vSphere fabric datastore resource instance.

external_region_id.description: Indicates the ID of region.

filter.description: Search criteria to narrow down the fabric Azure storage accounts.

id.description: The id of this fabric Azure storage account.

name.description: A human-friendly name of the fabric Azure storage account.

owner.description: Email of the user that owns the entity.

id.description: The id of the image resource instance.

name.description: A human-friendly name used as an identifier for the image resource instance.

os_family.description: Operating System family of the image.

private.description: Indicates whether this image is private. For vSphere, private images are considered to be templates and snapshots and public are Content Library Items.

external_region_id.description: The id of the region for which this profile is defined as in the cloud provider.

filter.description: Filter query string that is supported by vRA multi-cloud IaaS API. Example: regionId eq '<regionId>' and cloudAccountId eq '<cloudAccountId>'. Only one of 'filter', 'id', 'name' or 'region_id' must be specified.

id.description: The id of the image profile instance.  Only one of 'filter', 'id', 'name' or 'region_id' must be specified.

name.description: A human-friendly name used as an identifier in APIs that support this option.  Only one of 'filter', 'id', 'name' or 'region_id' must be specified.

owner.description: Email of the user that owns the entity.

region_id.description: The id of the region for which this profile is defined as in vRealize Automation(vRA).  Only one of 'filter', 'id', 'name' or 'region_id' must be specified.

updated_at.description: Date when the entity was last updated. The date is ISO 8601 and UTC.

cloud_config.description: Cloud config for this image. This cloud config will be merged during provisioning with other cloud configurations such as the bootConfig provided in MachineSpecification or vRA cloud templates.

external_id.description: External entity id on the cloud provider side.

external_region_id.description: External region id on the cloud provider side.

image_id.description: The id of this resource instance.

image_name.description: A human-friendly image name as seen on the cloud provider side.

name.description: A human-friendly name of the image mapping.

os_family.description: Operating system family of the image.

owner.description: Email of the user that owns the entity.

private.description: Indicates whether this fabric image is private. For vSphere, private images are considered to be templates and snapshots and public are Content Library items.

expression.description: An expression of the form "[!]tag-key[:[tag-value]]", used to indicate a constraint match on keys and values of tags.

mandatory.description: Indicates whether this constraint should be strictly enforced or not.

block.description: Constraints that are used to drive placement policies for entities such as image, network, storage, etc. Constraint expressions are matched against tags on existing placement targets.

administrators.description: List of administrator users associated with the project. Only administrators can manage project's configuration.

custom_properties.description: The project custom properties which are added to all requests in this project

id.description: The id of this project resource.

machine_naming_template.description: The naming template to be used for resources provisioned in this project.

members.description: List of member users associated with the project.

name.description: A human-friendly name used as an identifier in APIs that support this option.

operation_timeout.description: The timeout that should be used for Blueprint operations and Provisioning tasks. The timeout is in seconds.

placement_policy.description: The placement policy that will be applied when selecting a cloud zone for provisioning.

shared_resources.description: Specifies whether the resources in this projects are shared or not. If not set default will be used.

viewers.description: List of viewer users associated with the project.

email.description: The email of the user or name of the group.

type.description: Type of the principal. Currently supported ‘user’ (default) and 'group’.

block.description: List of administrator roles associated with the project. Only administrators can manage project's configuration.

mandatory.description: Indicates whether this constraint should be strictly enforced or not.

cpu_limit.description: The maximum amount of cpus that can be used by this cloud zone. Default is 0 (unlimited cpu).

max_instances.description: The maximum number of instances that can be provisioned in this cloud zone. Default is 0 (unlimited instances)

memory_limit_mb.description: The maximum amount of memory that can be used by this cloud zone. Default is 0 (unlimited memory).

priority.description: The priority of this zone in the current project. Lower numbers mean higher priority. Default is 0 (highest)

storage_limit_gb.description: Upper limit on storage that can be requested from a cloud zone which is part of this project. Default is 0 (unlimited storage). Supported only for vSphere cloud zones.

block.description: List of configurations for zone assignment to a project.
